name: Create a Zoom meeting from a new row in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Every time you add a new row to your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will create a new Zoom meeting.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygRFt4EwKeqT6hZ4l?e=Qa2rpA).
